Salah Mansour (Febụwarị 03, 1923 - Jenụwarị 19, 1979) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe  nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na Lan A'taref na Al-Zagwa Al-Thaneya
Ọ malitere n'ime ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ, ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Egypt Acting Institute na 1947
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nhazi nka wee sonye na ihe nkiri
O mechara bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ na Ministri Mmụta Ijipt
A mụrụ Salah Mansour na Shibin Al-Qanater, na Al-Qalyubia, Egypt.
